name: Onboard The MADE IN CHINA Jet! Flying the Comac C919
description:
I headed to Shanghai, China, to fly on China's first large passenger jet, the Comac C919, that claims to be a rival to the Airbus A320 and Boeing 737. But what's it like to fly on? 

Use Promo Code 'NOEL' for 20% off Atmotube PRO! https://tidd.ly/3J4cXWl Atmotube detects smoke, dust, and other fine particles in the air in real-time.
